<style>
    :root {
        --bg: #F4FFF4;
        --card: #FFFFFF;
        --accent: #4CAF50;
        --muted: #2E7D32;
        --border: #D9EFD9;
        --shadow: rgba(0,0,0,0.06);
    }
    html, body, [class*="stApp"] {
        background-color: var(--bg);
    }
    .title {
        text-align: center;
        color: var(--muted);
        font-size: 48px;
        font-weight: 800;
        margin-bottom: -6px;
        letter-spacing: -0.6px;
    }
    .subtitle {
        text-align: center;
        font-size: 16px;
        color: var(--accent);
        margin-bottom: 28px;
    }
    /* Streamlit-specific column styling to ensure cards are full-width within the column */
    .stContainer {	
        padding-left: 0;
        padding-right: 0;
    }
    /* Card layout */
    .feature-card {
        background-color: var(--card);
        border: 1px solid var(--border);
        padding: 26px;
        border-radius: 20px;
        /* Removed fixed width to allow columns to manage size */
        width: 100%;	
        min-height: 200px; /* Added min height for visual balance */
        display: flex; /* Flex properties to arrange content */
        flex-direction: column;
        box-shadow: 0 8px 20px var(--shadow);
        transition: transform 0.18s ease, box-shadow 0.18s ease;
        transform: translateY(45px);
    }
    .feature-card:hover { transform: translateY(-6px); box-shadow: 0 12px 30px var(--shadow); }
    .feature-title { font-size: 20px; font-weight: 700; color: var(--muted); margin-bottom: 8px; }
    .feature-desc { color: #4a774a; margin-bottom: 14px; flex-grow: 1; /* Pushes button to the bottom */ }
    .stButton>button {
        background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--accent), #81C784) !important;
        color: white !important;
        border: none !important;
        padding: 10px 14px !important;
        border-radius: 12px !important;
        font-weight: 701 !important;
        cursor: pointer !important;
        width: 100%; /* Make button fill card width */
    }

    .tip-card {
        background-color: var(--card);
        border-left: 6px solid var(--accent);
        padding: 22px;
        margin: 18px auto;
        border-radius: 12px;
        font-style: italic;
        font-size: 20px;
        max-width: 820px;
        color: #225e33;
        box-shadow: 0 8px 20px var(--shadow);
        text-align: center;
    }

    .chat-history {
        max-height: 260px;
        overflow-y: auto;
        padding: 10px;
        width: 100%;
    }
    .bubble-user {
        background: rgba(76,175,80,0.08);
        border: 1px solid rgba(76,175,80,0.12);
        padding: 10px 12px;
        margin-bottom: 10px;
        border-radius: 12px;
        max-width: 78%;
        color: #175a2a;
        margin-left: auto; /* Aligns user message to the right */
    }
    .bubble-ai {
        background: #f3fff4;
        border: 1px dashed rgba(46,125,50,0.08);
        padding: 10px 12px;
        margin-bottom: 10px;
        border-radius: 12px;
        max-width: 78%;
        color: #0f3f1e;
    }
    /* NEW STYLES FOR SIDEBAR CHAT INPUT/BUTTON */
    [data-testid="stSidebar"] [data-testid="textInputRoot"] input {
        border-radius: 12px;
        border: 1px solid #C8E6C9; /* Light green border */
        padding: 10px;
    }
    [data-testid="stSidebar"] [data-testid="baseButton-secondary"] {
        background-color: #81C784 !important; /* Light green background */
        color: white !important;
        border-radius: 12px !important;
        border: none !important;
        height: 48px;
        font-weight: 700 !important;
        transition: background-color 0.1s;
    }
    [data-testid="stSidebar"] [data-testid="baseButton-secondary"]:hover {
        background-color: #66BB6A !important; /* Slightly darker green on hover */
    }
    /* END NEW STYLES */

    /* Wider sidebar for chatbot */
    [data-testid="stSidebar"] {
       width: 40vw !important; 
 min-width: 40vw !important;
        max-width: 40vw !important;
    }

    /* responsive */
    @media (max-width: 880px) {
        /* No longer needed due to st.columns responsiveness */
        /* .features-row { flex-direction: column; align-items:center; } */
    }
    </style>

ollama.OllamaPrompt:
You are GreenGuard AI, a friendly, practical sustainability assistant.

Goals:
- Give clear, specific, and realistic suggestions to reduce a person's environmental impact.
- Prioritize high-impact actions (energy use, transport, food, and waste).
- Adapt your advice to the user's situation (e.g. country, housing type, budget).

Style:
- Be concise and structured (use short paragraphs or bullet points).
- Avoid guilt-tripping; be encouraging, practical, and non-judgmental.
- When unsure, say so and suggest how the user could check locally (e.g. city recycling rules).

Never claim to access real‑time data or control devices. If a question is outside sustainability or environment topics, answer briefly and then gently redirect back to helpful eco actions.
